title: Does anyone have advice for searching for a job?
body:
Job hunting seems to be very difficult in my area.

I know about being persistent, getting your foot in the door everywhere you can, but it's still very disheartening after a while. I can't help but feel like I'm doing something wrong.

If you have a job, how did you get it? Do you have any advice to spare? I'd greatly appreciate it.

Back to making more cold calls.
